item.title: 如果 TikTok 在美国因禁令而败诉怎么办？
item.description: TikTok 正朝着在美国全国范围内禁止使用的方向前进。【原文：TikTok is barreling toward a nationwide ban in the US.】

item.title: 指数调整后，Apollo 和 Workday 将加入 S&P 500 指数
item.description: 在最新的季度权重变化中，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. and Workday Inc. have been added to the S&P 500 index in the latest quarterly weighting change.】

item.title: NOS 称，ASML 前员工涉嫌窃取商业机密
item.description: 据荷兰公共广播公司 NOS 报道，ASML Holding NV 的一名前雇员因涉嫌窃取商业机密而在荷兰面临诉讼，这是这家先进芯片制造设备制造商的最新一起违规事件。【原文：A former ASML Holding NV employee is facing a lawsuit in the Netherlands over suspected theft of trade secrets, according to Dutch public broadcaster NOS, in the latest breach of the maker of advanced chip-manufacturing equipment.】

item.title: 超微公司获纳斯达克延期至二月提交申请
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. said Nasdaq Inc. has granted the company additional time to become compliant with listing rules, easing the near-term risk that the embattled server maker would be delisted.】

item.title: 国防初创公司 Palantir 和 Anduril 将保存战场数据以训练人工智能模型
item.description: 软件公司帕兰提尔科技公司（Palantir Technologies Inc.【原文：Software company Palantir Technologies Inc. and weapons maker Anduril Industries Inc. plan to accelerate the use of artificial intelligence in the US military and are inviting other companies to join the effort.】

item.title: 希腊信用评级因债务下降而被上调
item.description: Scope Ratings 公司上调了希腊的评级，并将希腊的强劲增长和债务下降作为做出这一决定的主要原因。【原文：Greece’s rating status was upgraded by Scope Ratings, which cited the strong growth and the declining debt as the main reasons for the decision.】

item.title: 零食制造商 Hearthside 与伊利诺伊州童工调查达成和解
item.description: 私募股权支持的零食生产商 Hearthside Food Solutions 已同意支付 450 万美元，以结束伊利诺伊州当局对该公司在该州工厂使用童工的指控进行的调查。【原文：Private equity-backed snack producer Hearthside Food Solutions has agreed to pay $4.5 million to end an investigation by Illinois authorities into allegations the business used child labor at facilities in the state.】

item.title: 丰业银行计划与 50 亿美元企业贷款相关的风险转移交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，丰业银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）正在就一项与企业贷款组合相关的重大风险转移交易征求投资者的意见。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia is sounding out investors on a significant risk-transfer transaction that would be linked to a portfolio of corporate loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 比尔-格罗斯警惕华尔街的 "风险动量狂热
item.description: 比特币一飞冲天，meme 股票毫无理由地飙升，看跌押注一下子崩溃。【原文：Bitcoin rallying to the moon, meme stocks surging for no good reason, bearish bets cratering all at once.】

item.title: 生育创业公司 Kindbody 在寻求资金的同时考虑出售产品
item.description: 据彭博社和知情人士查阅的一份文件显示，生育初创公司Kindbody在今年早些时候的一轮融资失败后，正在考虑出售自己，并寻求筹集1000万美元，以在此期间维持运营。【原文：Fertility startup Kindbody is considering selling itself after a funding round fell through earlier this year, and it’s seeking to raise $10 million to sustain operations in the interim, according to a document reviewed by Bloomberg and people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 雪佛龙公司称以色列天然气业务在过去的袭击中成为目标
item.description: 雪佛龙公司首席执行官迈克-沃思（Mike Wirth）说，在美国支持的停火计划于上月底生效之前，雪佛龙公司在以色列的天然气业务在战斗中遭到伊朗支持的真主党的袭击。【原文：Chevron Corp.’s Israeli gas operations were targeted by Iran-backed Hezbollah in fighting before a US-backed cease-fire plan came into effect late last month, Chief Executive Officer Mike Wirth said.】

item.title: 这位策略师为您推荐 2025 年的热门 ETF
item.description:
在本期万亿节目中，Astoria 投资组合顾问公司的约翰-达维（John Davi）谈到了他希望明年能超越 Mag 7 的基金。【原文：

On this episode of Trillions, John Davi of Astoria Portfolio Advisors talks about the funds he hopes will go beyond the Mag 7 next year.

】

item.title: 克利夫-阿斯内斯警告不要购买高杠杆 ETF
item.description:
他说波动阻力非常大

。【原文：

He says the volatility drag is very large

】

item.title: 官方未能缓解投资者担忧，巴西股市跌势加深
item.description: 在与政府经济团队成员的通话未能缓解人们对该国债务轨迹挥之不去的担忧之后，巴西资产大幅下挫。【原文：Brazilian assets tanked after a call with a member of the government’s economic team failed to ease lingering concerns about the country’s debt trajectory.】

item.title: 美国消费者借贷因信用卡余额激增而猛增
item.description: 10 月份美国消费者借贷增长超过预期，反映出信用卡余额自 2022 年中期以来的最大增幅。【原文：US consumer borrowing increased in October by more than forecast, reflecting the largest advance in credit-card balances since mid-2022.】

item.title: 赫兹债券持有人首次破产失败，担心出现新的动荡
item.description: 赫兹公司（Hertz Corp. ）的一位律师周五在联邦法院表示，赫兹公司债券持有人被拖欠约 3.2 亿美元的未付利息，这些利息是该公司在 Covid 破产时期遗留下来的。【原文：Hertz Corp. bondholders who are owed about $320 million in unpaid interest leftover from the company’s Covid-era bankruptcy, fear the car renter will delay paying them in the face of fresh financial turmoil, a lawyer said in federal court Friday.】

item.title: 苹果探索内置蜂窝数据的 Mac 和耳机
item.description: 苹果公司建立自己的调制解调器技术的努力将为一系列新设备奠定基础，首先是更轻薄的 iPhone，然后可能是与蜂窝连接的 Mac 和耳机。【原文：Apple Inc.’s effort to build its own modem technology will set the stage for a range of new devices, starting with slimmer iPhones and potentially leading to cellular-connected Macs and headsets.】

item.title: 美联储主席戴利称美国劳动力市场形势依然良好
item.description: 在周五公布新的就业数据后，玛丽-戴利主席表示，美国就业市场看起来仍然健康。【原文：President Mary Daly said the US jobs market still looked healthy after fresh employment data was released Friday.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）获得美国合同，扩大乌克兰使用星盾的机会
item.description: SpaceX 公司获得了五角大楼的一份合同，以扩大乌克兰对其 Starlink 卫星网络更安全、更军事化版本的使用，这加深了该公司在冲突中的参与，尽管其创始人埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对战争的态度暧昧。【原文：SpaceX received a Pentagon contract to expand Ukraine’s access to a more secure, militarized version of its Starlink satellite network, deepening the company’s involvement in the conflict despite founder Elon Musk’s ambivalence over the war.】

item.title: 巴西咖啡出口商在债务谈判中获得宽限期
item.description: Montesanto Tavares Group Participações SA 旗下的巴西咖啡出口商获得了 60 天的宽限期，以便与债权人重新谈判债务。【原文：Brazil coffee exporters owned by Montesanto Tavares Group Participações SA were granted a 60-day grace period to renegotiate debt with creditors.】

item.title: 新加坡政府投资公司（GIC）支持的成品房运营商 Yes！探索 2025 年首次公开募股
item.description: 是的！据知情人士透露，美国最大的工业化住宅社区运营商之一 Yes!【原文：Yes! Communities, one of the largest operators of manufactured-housing communities in the US, is exploring an initial public offering, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行在联合信贷银行收购要约中增持 BPM 股份
item.description: 法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）将其在 Banco BPM SpA 的持股比例提高到 15.1%，因为这家意大利贷款机构面临着意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的收购要约。【原文：Credit Agricole SA has raised its stake in Banco BPM SpA to 15.1%, as the Italian lender faces a takeover bid from UniCredit SpA.】

item.title: 贝莱德认为零售交易商将在 2025 年抢购小额债券
item.description: 大多数人都认为，2025 年将是地方和州政府债券销售的又一个丰收年。贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：By most accounts 2025 will be another blockbuster year for bond sales from local and state governments. And BlackRock Inc.’s head of municipal bonds Pat Haskell expects retail buyers to be eager to help digest that flood of new issuance.】

item.title: 最终幻想》制作人的新角色扮演游戏冲出苹果商场
item.description:
本周发布的《Fantasian Neo Dimension》让不想支付 Apple 订阅费的用户也能玩到这款广受好评的新游戏

。【原文：

This week’s release of Fantasian Neo Dimension allows people who don’t want to pay for an Apple subscription to play the acclaimed new game

】

item.title: 高盛探索出售客户用于推出 ETF 的平台
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is considering options for the future of its platform designed to help the bank’s institutional clients launch their own exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: 亿万富翁萨利纳斯的 Elektra 在 50 亿美元和一天的损失后奄奄一息
item.description: 有一段时间，墨西哥最大的家电零售商之一 Grupo Elektra 似乎将成为一只僵尸股。应控股股东的要求，该公司股票于 7 月份停止交易。当监管机构希望解除禁令时，该公司又力主延长禁令，双方展开了拉锯战，投资者陷入困境。【原文：For a while, it looked like Grupo Elektra, one of Mexico’s largest appliance retailers, was set to become a zombie stock. The shares stopped trading in July at the request of its controlling holder. When regulators wanted to lift the ban, the company pushed to extend it, setting up a tug-of-war and leaving investors in limbo.】

item.title: 加拿大西部银行因业绩无故延迟而暴跌
item.description: 加拿大西部银行（Canadian Western Bank）周五上午推迟发布第四财季财报，并让投资者猜测原因，导致该公司股价下挫。【原文：Canadian Western Bank shares sank after the firm delayed its fiscal fourth-quarter earnings release Friday morning and left investors guessing why.】

item.title: 墨西哥矿山三名工人遇难，Torex 股票大跌
item.description: 在 Torex Gold Resources Inc. 披露墨西哥矿山发生三人死亡事故后，该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Torex Gold Resources Inc. plunged after the gold miner disclosed a fatal accident at a Mexican mine that killed three people.】

item.title: 加密货币借贷者从上一次投机泡沫的废墟中崛起
item.description: 助推比特币首次突破 10 万美元的投机泡沫正在蔓延到长期受挫的加密货币借贷领域，而去中心化的金融应用这次则走在了前列。【原文：The speculative froth that helped to propel Bitcoin past $100,000 for the first time is spilling over into the long-battered crypto lending sector, with decentralized finance applications leading the way this time.】

item.title: 英国真理家为减少甲烷的饲料添加剂大伤脑筋
item.description: 如果你相信最近席卷英国的阴谋论，那么丹麦就有问题了。但首先...【原文：If you believe the latest conspiracy theory to sweep the UK, something stinks in the state of Denmark. But first…】
